title: Nexus Blitz / Magma Chamber
body:
So far I love Nexus Blitz. And the Nexus Blitz map obviously isnt finished, visually. I think it would be really cool if Riot made the map look like the Magma Chamber would've, with the Nexus Blitz layout, of course. Since the Magma Chamber never was released. I think the aesthetics would suit Nexus Blitz really well with lava and obsidian, etc. I have no idea if Riot has the magma chamber stored away in a file somewhere in their super secret archives but I guess they could re-use some of the textures from that. Its just an idea though. https://i.gyazo.com/bfc80d7f4e35dfda2e9355e758644fef.jpg https://i.gyazo.com/6a64f78e6db416a02fa8e7d995747bb2.png https://i.gyazo.com/0c4613dc1984456a8d1699b452d0c750.jpg https://i.gyazo.com/2dead35151e051a2874a8de692ac979f.png
